data.name: Annihilate
data.note:
Builds 15 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You concentrate on your magical powers for up to 3 seconds, opening your body to serve as a vessel for the raw power of the Red Wind. The unleashed power will deal X corporeal damage each second to all enemies within 30 feet. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Backdraft
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: Aqshy, the Wind of Fire, bursts forth explosively around you, dealing X corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet knocking them back a far distance. (Placeholder)

data.name: Boiling Blood
data.note:
Builds 5 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: Your target takes a X ability penalty to willpower for 10 seconds. When the effect ends, the victim will suffer X corporeal damage.

data.name: Burning Iron
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: Your target's armor become red hot, dealing X corporeal damage to them. For the next 10s, Fireball and Fireball Barrage will deal 10% more damage to the target.

data.name: Burnout
data.note: Costs 40 Combustion
data.description: You call upon the Winds Of Magic to grant you power, instantly regaining 160 action points.

data.name: Cauterize
data.note: You must be Cursed, Hexed, or Ailing
data.description: You cause an open wound to sear itself shut, removing one hex, curse, or ailment from yourself.

data.name: Choking Smoke
data.note:
Builds 20 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: A Hex which turns the air into unbreathable smoke and ash, dealing X corporeal damage to your target. The target and all other enemies within 20 feet become silenced for 3 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Close Quarters
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Conflagration of Doom
data.description: A spot that you select bursts into flames for 8 seconds, dealing 200 damage each second to all enemies within 20 feet.

data.name: Detonate
data.note:
Target must be Hexed
Builds 25 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You reach through the power of a hex on the target to instantly deal X elemental damage to them, and an additional Y elemental damage over 9 seconds to them and all other enemies within 20 feet.

data.name: Devour Energy
data.description: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain 30 action points. This effect can not occur more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Distracting Fires
data.description: Reduces the cooldown times of Smoke Screen and Fire Cage by 7 seconds.

data.name: Fire Starter
data.description: Fireball and Fireball Barrage cause enemies they strike to take X elemental damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Embrace The Flames
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy with a direct damage ability, you will gain 200 points of morale. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Endless Knowledge
data.description: Grants a 160 unique bonus to intelligence.

data.name: Explosive Force
data.description: Any time that your combustion causes an explosion, the blast will also deal 50% of the damage to all enemies within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Fan The Flames
data.description: Increases the radii of Rain Of Fire and Detonate by 50%.

data.name: Fiery Blast
data.note:
Builds 20 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You fling a massive ball of fire, dealing X elemental damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Fiery Reserves
data.description: Reduces the cooldown times of Flame Breath and Rain Of Fire by 10 seconds.

data.name: Fire Cage
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are rooted as they become trapped within a cage of searing flames, making them unable to move for 5 seconds. Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.

data.name: Fireball
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You conjure up a fiery missile which slams into your target, dealing X elemental damage.

data.name: Fireball Barrage
data.note:
Costs 15 Combustion/Sec
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You assault your target with a constant stream of fireballs, striking them up to 3 times over 3 seconds. Each blast deals X elemental damage to your target and Y elemental damage to other enemies within 20 feet.. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Flame Breath
data.note:
Builds 20 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You momentarily turn your very breath into a rolling burst of flames, dealing X elemental damage over 9 seconds to all enemies in a cone in front of you, up to 40 feet away.

data.name: Flame Shield
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet are enchanted with a protective shield of flickering flames for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal X elemental damage back against the attacker when they are struck by a melee attack.

data.name: Flames of Rhuin
data.description: An enchantment which infuses your groupmates within 100 feet of you with the spirit of fire for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal an additional X elemental damage any time they deal damage to a target.

data.name: Flashfire
data.description: Whenever you cast Meltdown or Fireball Barrage, you will generate 1 stack of Flashfire, max 3 stacks. Each stack of Flashfire reduced the build-up time of your next Fireball or Pyroclastic Surge by 33%.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Fuel To The Fire
data.description: Boiling Blood's willpower debuff is increased to Y for 5 seconds and will deal X corporeal damage at the end of the debuff duration.

data.name: Fueled From Within
data.description: Flames Of Rhuin will now deal X elemental damage, and Flame Shield will now deal Y elemental damage.

data.name: Funnel Power
data.description: You become a living conduit for the power of the Red Wind of Magic, causing all of your directly damaging magical attacks to deal an additional X corporeal damage to your target, but you will also suffer X/2 damage for each one. Use this ability again to turn it off.

data.name: Heart of Fire
data.description: Removes all hexes and curses from you. You regain 485 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Ignite
data.note:
Builds 5 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: A hex which causes your target to burst into flames, dealing X elemental damage to them over 9 seconds.

data.name: Ignition
data.description: The ap cost of Ignite is reduced by 20 and it causes enemies to take a X unique penalty to corporeal resistance for 9 seconds.

data.name: Lingering Fires
data.description: Pyroclastic Surge and Scorched Earth gain a 25% chance to cause an additional X elemental damage over 5 seconds to each target hit.

data.name: Mage Bolt
data.description: A focused blast that deals 600 damage and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Magic Dart
data.description: Deals 600 damage to your target immediately, and another 1206 damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Meltdown
data.note: Costs 20 Combustion
data.description: You expel some of you Combustion in a fiery blast, dealing X elemental damage to your target.

data.name: Misdirection
data.description: You gain a strong counter aura for the next 10 seconds that will reduce half of any incoming magic damage and redirect half of any direct damage back to the caster.

data.name: Nova
data.note:
Builds 40 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: A powerful spell which makes your target spontaneously combust, dealing X elemental damage to them.

data.name: Playing With Fire
data.description: A hex which surrounds the target with hungry flames, causing all healing used on them for the next 10 seconds to become 50% less effective. Each time someone attempts to use a direct heal on them, the flames will lash out, and healer will suffer X elemental damage.

data.name: Power From The Ashes
data.description: Meltdown will now cause you to deal 10% more damage for 5 seconds.

data.name: Pyroclastic Surge
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: A fountain of molten lava envelops your target, dealing X corporeal damage. If you have 80 or less combustion, the cast time will be reduced to 1.0 seconds.

data.name: Rain of Fire
data.note:
Builds 15 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You call down a shower of flames from the Winds Of Magic that rains down for the next 9 seconds, falling upon a spot you select and repeatedly dealing X elemental damage to all enemies within 20 feet of that spot.

data.name: Ruin And Destruction
data.description: Deals 448 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and causes them to take a 180 morale penalty to wounds for 10 seconds.

data.name: Scintillating Energy
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to your target, and staggers them for 9 seconds, preventing all actions until they take damage.

data.name: Scorched Earth
data.note:
Costs 20 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You send a blast of heat into the ground around you, dealing X corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Sear
data.note:
Builds 25 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: Causes a pillar of scalding gas to erupt from the ground, dealing X elemental damage to your target.

data.name: Searing Vitality
data.description: Sear will now heal you for 67% of the damage that it deals.

data.name: Shield of Aqshy
data.description: An enchantment which calls upon the power of the Red Wind to give you a X ability bonus to armor for 10 seconds, and makes it 50% less likely that you will be set back while building up abilities.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain an additional 135 hit points as well.

data.name: Siphon Power
data.description: Steals up to 200 action points from your target and gives it to you, and causes your target to take a 160 unique penalty to intelligence for 30 seconds.

data.name: Sleight of Hand
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 50% less than normal.

data.name: Slow Boil
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, the target is inflicted with a hex which raises their temperature to a delirious fever, causing them to lose 6 action points every 1 seconds. When this effect ends, they will suffer X corporeal damage as the fever peaks.

data.name: Smoke Screen
data.description: You detaunt your target by surrounding them with thick smoke, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Smoldering Embers
data.description: Detonate will now spread Withering Heat and Boiling Blood from the target to enemies within 20 feet of target.

data.name: Spreading Flames
data.note:
Builds 10 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: Deals X elemental damage to your target over 3 seconds. At the end of this effect, it spreads to 4 enemies within 30 feet. This spread will happen up to 4 times, each time spreading to 1 more enemy, for a total of 15 second duration. Each target can only have a maximum of two of these effects from the same Bright Wizard at any time.

data.name: Stop, Drop, And Roll
data.description: Fuck flavor text atm. Deals X corporeal damage. Deals Y corporeal damage over 3s.

data.name: The Burning Head
data.note: Builds 10 Combustion
data.description: You ignite the fires of Aqshy swirling and molding them into a fiery skull that you fire at your target. The target and enemies within 30 take X elemental damage. Up to 9 allies within 30 feet of the target will gain 10% increased damage for 6 seconds.

data.name: Unleash the Winds
data.description: Deals 1800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and knocks them away from you.

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to spirit resistance and a 170 unique bonus to corporeal and elemental resistance.

data.name: Wall of Fire
data.description: A wall of fire shoots outwards from you and remains on the ground for 8 seconds, dealing 200 damage each second to all enemies in a line in front of you up to 65 feet away from you.

data.name: Wildfire
data.description: When an enemy is hit by any Conflagration ability, there is a 25% chance that they will become covered in flames, receiving X elemental damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: Withering Heat
data.note:
Builds 20 Combustion
Has a chance to cause an Explosion!
data.description: You turn the air around your enemy into a grasping storm of burning flames dealing X corporeal damage over 21 seconds. Each time this deals damage, you will generate 3 Combustion.

data.name: Combustion
data.note: Builds up to 100. Rests at 0.
data.description:
1-10: +4% magic crit, +10% crit damage, 4% chance of explosion.
11-30: +8% magic crit, +20% crit damage, 8% chance of explosion.
31-70: +15% magic crit, +40% crit damage, 15% chance of explosion.
71-90: +25% magic crit, +80% crit damage, 25% chance of explosion.
1-10: +35% magic crit, +100% crit damage, 35% chance of explosion.

Explosions deal (40/300 + 0.5INT) elemental damage to the caster and can critically hit.
